main.name: Dhrumil Shah
main.bio: I am a hard-working and performance-driven Software Developer with skilled in Web Development and Machine Learning. Strong computer science professional skills with a Master's degree focused on Applied Computing from the University of Windsor. I have built numerous websites and web applications by following the Agile methodologies being a Full Stack Developer. I have a specialization in JavaScript and have professional experience in RESTful APIs making using Node.js, Python as well as database design using MongoDB, SQL, and Front-end development with React.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I am always interested in exploring new technologies but these are the ones that I am proficient in.

education.school: L.D. College of Engineering (Gujarat Technological University)
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

projects.title: Weather Finder
projects.category: A React based weather finder app which fetch the data through API call

projects.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
projects.category: Python based sentiment analysis using tweepy and textblob

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Tim on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Tim excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
testimonials.user: Alastair Beaumont - Web Developer at AppColony
